title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions:
### Unleash Your Gaming Potential with the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard

Dive into the world of competitive gaming with the **Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard**. Designed for FPS gamers, this compact mechanical keyboard is a blend of style, performance, and efficiency, making it the perfect companion for your gaming adventures.

#### **Key Features:**

- **60% Compact Layout:**
  - With only 61 keys, the K617 Fizz offers a sleek and minimalistic design that saves desk space, providing more room for your mouse to maneuver. Ideal for those with limited desk real estate or a preference for a cleaner setup.

- **Linear Red Switches:**
  - Experience smooth, quiet, and responsive key presses with the linear red switches. These switches have a lifespan of 50 million keypresses, ensuring durability and reliability over time. The hot-swappable feature allows you to customize your keyboard by easily switching out switches to suit your preferences.

- **Stunning RGB Backlighting:**
  - Illuminate your gaming setup with 20 customizable RGB lighting presets. Adjust the brightness and flow speed to match your mood or gaming environment. The K617 Fizz's LED backlighting not only looks impressive but also enhances visibility in low-light conditions.

- **Professional Driver and Software Support:**
  - Take full control of your gaming experience with the included Pro Driver software. Customize keybindings, macros, and shortcuts to streamline your gameplay. The software also offers a range of design modes and effects, allowing you to personalize your keyboard to your unique style.

- **White and Grey Keycaps:**
  - The high-quality white and grey keycaps add a touch of elegance and modernity to your setup. The keycaps are designed for comfort and durability, ensuring a pleasant typing experience during extended gaming sessions.

- **Efficient Workspace Management:**
  - The compact 60% layout not only saves space but also optimizes your workspace, making it easier to navigate and perform at your best. Whether you're gaming, coding, or working, the K617 Fizz is your go-to keyboard for efficiency and performance.

#### **Why Choose the Redragon K617 Fizz?**

- **Built for FPS Gamers:**
  - The K617 Fizz is specifically designed for first-person shooter (FPS) gamers, offering a layout and features that enhance your gaming experience. The linear red switches provide the fast and responsive feedback needed for quick reflexes and split-second decisions.

- **Versatile and Customizable:**
  - Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive player, the K617 Fizz offers the flexibility to adapt to your needs. The hot-swappable switches, customizable RGB lighting, and Pro Driver software ensure that your keyboard is always tailored to your preferences.

- **Reliable and Durable:**
  - With a lifespan of 50 million keypresses, the K617 Fizz is built to last. The high-quality materials and construction ensure that your keyboard will withstand the rigors of intense gaming sessions.

### **Upgrade Your Gaming Setup Today!**

Don't settle for a keyboard that holds you back. The Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard is the ultimate tool for FPS gamers looking to elevate their performance and style. Order yours now and experience the difference a premium gaming keyboard can make!

---

**[Shop Now](https://redragonshop.com) and join the ranks of elite gamers!**
